what: Access the National Highways API from R
title: Access the National Highways API from R
text: repository pulls data National Highways WebTRIS API. Currently, National Highways directly monitor speed flow roads using road sensors fall following categories: MIDAS sites (Motorway Incident Detection Automatic Signalling) predominantly inductive loops. TMU sites (Traffic Monitoring Units) inductive loops. TAME sites (Traffic Appraisal, Modelling Economics) inductive loops. TRADS Legacy sites.
